title: What is PlanetScale DB?
content:

What is PlanetScale DB? PlanetScale is a MySQL-compatible, serverless database platform powered by Vitess, which is a database clustering system for horizontal scaling of MySQL (as well as Percona and MariaDB). Vitess also powers Slack, Square, GitHub, and YouTube, among others.

Tham kh·∫£o

title: Data Analysis Using SQL?
content:
SQL for data analysis refers to the database querying language's use of relational databases and its capacity for simultaneous interaction with various databases. The combination of a surprisingly low learning curve and a deep complexity that enables users to build sophisticated tools and dashboards for data analytics makes SQL one of the most widely used and universal languages.

In fact, Python, Scala, and Hadoop are three of the most popular languages used today for managing and manipulating large data which can be learned in a data science certification course accredited by IBM.

title: How Can A Data Science Internship Improve Your Future Job Prospect?
content:
Potential Benefits Offered by Data Science Internship

Exposure to Real-world application An internship is a fantastic way to gain experience working on real-world projects and connecting with clients.

Timing flexibility Since most employers won't anticipate an internship to fill a full delivery job, you can use the downtime to concentrate on acquiring new skills in addition to your internship duties.

Practicing technical Skills The learning phase's capstone project uses learning data, which can be used in internships to practice technical skills and comprehend the difference between learning data and real-world data.

Responsibilities and roles Understand the many roles involved, their duties, and how data science initiatives are carried out.

Communication with stakeholders Numerous teams, including business analysts, subject matter experts, customers, or other business stakeholders, are involved in data science projects. One of the essential skills that may be acquired during the internship is effective communication.

Make connections with business leaders Through project interactions and networking, internships assist in establishing connections with senior industry executives. This might be quite helpful while you pursue your profession.

Obtain employment experience Gaining experience through real-world initiatives during an internship enhances your resume and helps you land a job.

Relevant Job Offers In rare circumstances, the internship may result in a job offer.

So, How can you apply for an internship in Data Science and AI?

Your career in data science should start with a data science internship. It is crucial to choose an internship that will give you an opportunity to develop your technical abilities and obtain real-world experience. To ensure you are internship-ready, you should take care of the following before applying for the internship:

Academic credentials, certifications, and references About data science, Academic achievements, or certificates, improve your resume. Analyze the appropriate qualifications and pursue them as necessary. You can also obtain recommendations from professors and reputable data scientists to support your credentials. It's time to start applying for internships now. An IBM-accredited data science certification course in Bangalore is the best way to showcase your credentials on your resume.

The following are a few factors that will increase your chances of getting the data science internship of your choice.

Networking: The ability to network is crucial for landing your first internship. Start investigating your relationships by starting with known contacts, friends, and family, and finally, open networking by going to data science-related events.

Send your résumé to all prospective contacts, act enthusiastically, and follow up regularly. Be quick to accept the first offer to talk about potential internships.

Look through job websites like linkedin.com and submit your online application for suitable internships. Additionally, you can submit your application through the websites of your selected employers.

Consider the internship options from the standpoint of learning opportunities and prospective future employment when you receive many offers.

Technically Ready Strong conceptual comprehension and technical abilities are necessary for the internship role. You should excel in data preparation, machine learning modeling, and Python programming.

Data Science Projects You should have completed 20 learning or capstone data science projects using fully operational machine learning algorithms. It is strongly advised that you keep track of your code developments in cloud repositories like Github so that you may show them to prospective employers to demonstrate your subject-matter expertise.

Conclusion I hope this article will be helpful for obtaining a successful data science internship. Before wrapping up, I want to point out that while there is no foolproof method, the advice above will improve your chances of standing out from the crowd and pursuing your desired career. Never forget that persistence and patience are essential for professional success. Furthermore, if you want to start learning everything from scratch or want to upgrade your skills, I suggest you take up the best data science course in Bangalore. Learn and acquire hands-on practical experience to be confident before applying for any internship or job.

Good luck!

title: Type checking condition(v-if) in template - Vue Typescript
content:

interface TabProps {

  iconPosition: 'left',
});

    <template v-if="icon" #leftIcon>

    </template>

Mình th·∫Øc m·∫Øc ·ªü ch·ªó là:

N·∫øu dùng v-if nh∆∞ này <template v-if="icon" #leftIcon>

=> Error: Type 'IconName | undefined' is not assignable to type 'IconName'.

title: Ant modal trong vue3 vite kh√¥ng ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông
content:
M·ªçi ng∆∞·ªùi cho em h·ªèi là ant modal n·∫øu tách thành component thì nó l·∫°i không ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông ·∫°. ƒêây là file test.vue ch·ª©a modal

<script setup lang="ts">
import { reactive, computed, defineProps, defineEmits} from "vue";

let { visible } = defineProps({visible: {type: Boolean, required: true}})
const emit = defineEmits(['closeModal'])

// const state = reactive<any>({
//   visible: false,
// });


const visibleModal = computed({
    get() {
      return visible;
    },
    set(value) {
        emit('closeModal');
    }
})

</script>

<template>
  <div>
    <a-modal v-model:visible="visibleModal" title="Basic Modal">
        {{ visibleModal  }}
      <p>Some contents...</p>
      <p>Some contents...</p>
      <p>Some contents...</p>
    </a-modal>
  </div>
</template>

title: Binding prop trong Vue Typescript
content:
Xin chào m·ªçi ng∆∞·ªùi Mình ƒëang h·ªçc vue và ƒëang làm project c∆° b·∫£n ƒë·ªÉ h·ªçc nó Mình dùng vue 3 và typescript Mình ƒëang có m·ªôt component MenuItem có type c∆° b·∫£n nh∆∞ sau

interface MenuItemProps {
  title: string;
  to?: string | '';
  icon?: IconName | '';
}
withDefaults(defineProps<MenuItemProps>(), {
  to: '',
  icon: '',
});

1 prop required và 2 prop optional => ·ªû ƒëây mình mu·ªën v·ª´a là link v·ª´a là item normal cho các action nh∆∞ show modal và change language.

·ªû component Menu mình g·ªçi nó nh∆∞ sau

export const BASE_MENU: BaseMenu[] = [
  {
    icon: 'language',
    title: 'Language',
    languages: languages.map((lang) => ({
      title: lang.title,
      lang: lang.lang,
    })),
  },
  {
    icon: 'help',
    title: 'Help',
  },
];

interface MenuItem {
  title: string;
  icon: IconName;
}

export interface MenuItemLink extends MenuItem {
  to: string;
}

export interface MenuItemLangue extends Omit<MenuItem, 'icon'> {
  languages?: {
    title: string;
    lang: string;
  }[];
}

export type BaseMenu = MenuItemLangue & Partial<Pick<MenuItemLink, 'to' | 'icon'>>;

type Menu = BaseMenu[] | MenuItemLangue;

const menuItems = reactive<{ data: Menu }>({ data: props.items });

const handleChange = (item: BaseMenu, _evt: Event) => {
  if (item.icon === 'language') {
    menuItems.data = item;
  } 
  ...
};

...
 <MenuItem
              v-for="(item, index) in currentMenuList"
              :key="index"
              :to="item.to" 
             :icon="item.icon"
              @onClick="(event) => handleChange(item, event)"
/>
 

·ªû ƒëây mình mu·ªën là là khi b·∫•m vào cái menu item language thì render list languages.

·ªû ƒëây thì m·ªói item trong currentMenuList nó s·∫Ω có 2 type là

{ languages?: { title: string; lang: string; }[] | undefined; title: string; to?: string | undefined; icon?: IconName | undefined; } | { title: string; lang: string; }

Lúc này mình passing :to="item.to" :icon="item.icon" thì typescript l·ªói là Property 'icon' does not exist on type '{ title: string; lang: string; }'

Lúc này mình search gg th·ª≠ thì có th·∫•y dùng v-bind.

Mình l·∫°i th·ª≠ nh∆∞ này thì v·∫´n l·ªói v-bind="{ to: item?.to || '', icon: item?.icon || '', title: item.title }"

Mình l·∫°i ti·∫øp t·ª•c th·ª≠ ki·ªÉu này.

<MenuItem
              v-for="(item, index) in currentMenuList"
              :key="index"
              v-bind="item"
              @onClick="(event) => handleChange(item, event)"
            />

Vâng th·∫ø này thì nó h·∫øt l·ªói. Nh∆∞ng có v·∫Ω không hay l·∫Øm, khó bi·∫øt ƒë∆∞·ª£c props mình passing.

M·ªçi ng∆∞·ªùi có cách nào binding mà không dính l·ªói type không ·∫°

title: [Rails] T·∫°o v√† qu·∫£n l√Ω jobs v·ªõi dynamic th·ªùi gian ch·∫°y job v√† Timezone
content:
Xin chào m·ªçi ng∆∞·ªùi, mình ƒëang có m·ªôt bài toán v·ªÅ vi·ªác t·∫°o job trong ruby on rails nh∆∞ sau, xin ý ki·∫øn th·∫£o lu·∫≠n gi·∫£i pháp hay t·ª´ m·ªçi ng∆∞·ªùi. ·ª®ng d·ª•ng cho phép ng∆∞·ªùi dùng ƒë·∫∑t l·ªãch (schedule) ƒë·ªÉ ch·∫°y m·ªôt chi·∫øn d·ªãch qu·∫£ng cáo theo ngày. Ng∆∞·ªùi dùng có th·ªÉ l·ª±a ch·ªçn timezone t·∫°o job, gi·ªù b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu ch·∫°y job, gi·ªù k·∫øt thúc job trong m·ªôt ngày và l·ª±a ch·ªçn ch·∫°y l·∫∑p th·ªùi gian/l·∫ßn.

Sau ƒëó s·∫Ω dùng m·ªôt cái job t·ªïng to ch·∫°y h·∫±ng ngày (vd 15ph/1 l·∫ßn) ƒë·ªÉ xem có schedule nào th·∫£o mãn s·∫Ω t·∫°o m·ªôt cái job ƒë·ªÉ ch·∫°y. title: Can we connect multiple microphones to the computer
